info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 4:47PM MST until August 18 at 7:15PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 447 PM MST, Heavy rain continues between Dolan Springs and Yucca. Sugarloaf Mountain rain gauge north of Golden Valley has picked up 1.73 inches of rainfall in the past hour. Flash flooding remains likely across roadways in Golden Valley...Dolan Springs and Yucca. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Yucca, Golden Valley, Oatman, Chloride, Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground and Dolan Springs. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
